ygData.subject: Re: Rude  people.
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes yes yes rude people SUCK bad!  and yes i know what u mean about how name changing suck...... my wiz Fredthefrog Tastesgood was changed to Fredfrog
ygData.messageBody:
Yes yes yes rude people SUCK bad! and yes i know what u mean about
how name changing suck...... my wiz Fredthefrog Tastesgood was
changed to Fredfrog Tastylegs without my knoledge, and my old
enchanter Fireinmyeyes was changed to Firgion....... i hate our
server gm so much for that lol. yeah and your very right about the
germ thing! lol ok ttyl!

--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "sastvis" <sastvis@y...> wrote:
> We all know that there are rude peeps on EQ. There is one person
> that almost everyone on the Fennin server knows. Uncledread. The
> other night someone petitioned the GM's on an unrelated issue and
> right after the gm introduced him/her self, he/she asked if the
> petition was about Uncledread. The person went ahead and said
yes.
> Uncledread's account is now banned lol. That will hopefully teach
> him a lesson and change his attitude towards other people. I
guess
> he had so many bad flags on his account that the GM's decided
enough
> is enough. Why waste our time on this guy if he keeps ignoring
our
> warnings. I've only been playing EQ for about 3 months to the day
> and despite the negative aspects, I am addicted hehe. Not so much
> addicted as to getting mad about having to do RL stuff but
addicted
> enough to sometimes say lol in RL speech or to say "group"
or "guild"
> verbally before saying something to someone lol.
>
>
> The 41st Iksar Necromancer formally known as Necrosars Corpses.
> Now known as Piezie V'rix :(
> (My name was changed without my knowledge because the combination
I
> saw as part Necromancer and part Iksar, someone else saw
as 'NE'(any)
> cro'SARS' 'CORPSES'. I mean come on. That is just rediculous.
I'm
> still trying to get my name back hehe. One day, one day. O btw
to
> edumicate the masses, more people die from the Flu each year than
> that stupid SARS thing everyone is so fricken afraid of. I mean
come
> on. You get more germs on your hands grabbing the door handle of
the
> restroom than you do wiping your self with your hand. A lot good
> washing your hands did before you touched the door handle lol.
Well
> I'll quit babbleing. I'm just so bored. I'm at college and i
can't
> play everquest on the computers there. I look forward to reading
> more chats :D
>
> Also the 19th Iksar Shaman known as Gloknich.
>
> Fennin Ro again btw for those that wanna play hehe. I'm usualy on
> almost all day.
